sn1.2:1.2: Atha kho annatara devata abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thita kho sa devata bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn1.2:2.1: “Janasi no tvam, marisa, sattanam nimokkham pamokkham vivekan”ti?
sn1.2:3.1: “Janami khvaham, avuso, sattanam nimokkham pamokkham vivekan”ti.
sn1.2:4.1: “Yathakatham pana tvam, marisa, janasi sattanam nimokkham pamokkham vivekan”ti?
